metadata.notes: HYBRID VALIDATION APPLIED: Unit designation, aircraft variant (CR.42 Falco), and operational dates confirmed via Tier 2 sources (Flying Lions, Comando Supremo). Deployed to North Africa July 24, 1941 with 12 CR.42s from 150° Gruppo CT. Operated from Sorman, then Ara dei Fileni and Bir El Merduma during Q4 1941 (Operation Crusader period). Commander Lt. Col. Innocenzo Monti confirmed. Personnel and ordnance estimates based on standard Italian gruppo organization. Returned to Italy June 3, 1942 after 11 months operations.
